entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
